## This folder contains all the reports generated by firing SQL queries.

--- 

Let's take an example of Croma(Customer of Atliq Hardware) MoM Sales Anaysis

## Pivot & Chart analysis
<img width="859" height="234" alt="image" src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bbd22446-0ba9-45f5-bb6a-c7beaa25a752" />

---

## Key Insights
<img width="577" height="124" alt="image" src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e2a44b9c-9dde-4597-bd64-ed7095f5f1e7" />

### 1. Sep–Dec alone contributes ~75% of total sales likely driven by
- Festive Sales
- Year-End offers
- High Customer electronics demand

### 2. December is the highest-performing month, contributing roughly one-third of total sales
- Inventory, marketing, and staffing should be maximized in December
- Any disruption in December would severely impact annual revenue

### 3. The first half of the year shows weak and stagnant sales performance
  
  #### Indicates:
  - Low Baseline demand
  - Post-festive slowdown

  #### Opportunity to introduce
  - Mid-Year promotions
  - Product refresh campaigns

### 4. Revenue is highly time-concentrated, increasing dependency on a few peak months
- If festive sales underperform → annual target at risk
- Business lacks stable month-to-month revenue
